message: Let's split it 50/50 to start. Your turn!
I'll take the majority, but I'll give you a decent share
I'll give you a slight majority, but I'm still looking for a fair deal. Your turn!
I'll give you a slightly smaller share, but I'm still being generous
I'll take a slightly larger share, but I'm still willing to compromise. Your turn!
I'll take a bigger share, but I'm still willing to give you a decent chunk
I'm going back to a 50/50 split. It's time to meet in the middle!
